projects.title: Network Security Monitoring System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive network security monitoring system using open-source tools to detect and alert on suspicious network activities.

projects.title: Automated Vulnerability Scanner
projects.description: Developed a customized vulnerability scanning tool that automates the process of identifying security weaknesses in web applications.

projects.title: Secure File Sharing System
projects.description: Created a secure file sharing system with end-to-end encryption, multi-factor authentication, and comprehensive audit logging capabilities.
